name: firebase-manage
title: Firebase Manage
description: Manage your Firebase Firestore database directly from Raycast
author: bharath21

commands.name: firestore-documents
commands.title: Firestore Manage
commands.description: List and filter documents from Firestore collections

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
